remote_ques1_rep: The account opening delegate harvest is to transfer its importance score to the remote account. The remote account inherits the importance of the original account, enables online remote "mining", and collects the rewards of the harvest.

namespace_tips_key_1: 1. The length of the root namespace is limited to 16 characters, and the length of the secondary namespace is limited to 64 characters. Valid characters:
namespace_tips_key_2: 2. The first character of the namespace must use English letters. The namespaces that are not allowed include strings:
namespace_tips_key_3: 3. The namespace can be defined as up to three layers.
namespace_tips_value_2: nem, user, account, org, com, biz, net, edu, mil, gov , info.
namespace_duration_tip_1: The duration is calculated in blocks, one block is 12 seconds, one block = 1XEM, and the maximum validity period is 365 days.
namespace_list_tips_1: 1. Only the root namespace needs to be updated. All subspace namespaces will be automatically expanded after the root namespace is expanded;
namespace_list_tips_2: 2. According to the lease agreement, the contract with the namespace can be up to one year, and the contract can be renewed one month before or after its due date. If the namespace is not expanded in time, the name created under it and All subspaces of the mosaic will be lost;

The_wallet_terminal_will_use_the_HD_WALL: The wallet terminal will use the HD-WALLET protocol to provide convenient wallet management. The account default wallet will be a helper wallet;
follow one account, one seed(mnemonic), one password principle;

therefore, there can be multiple wallet lists under one account. , with account password management, once you forget the password, you can restore the wallet by importing mnemonics; you can easily switch to other accounts on the startup page of the program.

The wallet terminal will use the HD-WALLET protocol to provide convenient wallet management. The account default wallet will be a helper wallet; follow one account, one seed, one password principle; therefore, there can be multiple wallet lists under one account. , with account password management, once you forget the password, you can restore the wallet by importing mnemonics; you can easily switch to other accounts on the startup page of the program.
Import_a_seed_file_from_a_WLT_file_or_ha: Import a seed file from a WLT file or hardware wallet
please_accurately_copy_the_hd_wallet_pat: Please accurately copy the hd-wallet path
connect_trezor_title: Connect to a Trezor Hardware Wallet
connect_trezor_description: Import a wallet from a Trezor device
trezor_description: Trezor will keep your private keys secure and only expose them for signing transactions
mosaic_describe_text: A mosaic could be a token, but it could also be a collection of more specialized assets such as reward points, company shares, signatures, status flags, votes or even currencies.
mosaic_attribute_text: Each mosaic has a unique identifier and a set of configurable properties, This makes it very flexible to adapt to many scenarios.
mosaic_attribute_text_2: You can bind a specific namespace to a mosaic to make it distinguishable.
Under_the_current_wallet: Under the current wallet, namespace and sub-namespace asset list, transaction management list
A_namespace_starts_with_a_name_that_you_: A namespace starts with a name that you choose, similar to an internet domain name.
The_name_must_appear_as_unique_in_the_ne: The name must appear as unique in the network, and may have a maximum length of 64 characters.
Namespaces_can_have_up_to_3_levels: Namespaces can have up to 3 levels, a namespace and its two levels of sub namespace domains. A sub namespace sub namespace does not have a duration by its own; it inherits the duration from its parent namespace.
Used_to_bind_a_wallet_address: Used to bind a wallet address as its transfer alias; used to set up an account filter; used to bind a Mosaic ID.
seed_wallet_can_not_be_more_than_10: The number of wallets created in this account has reached the limit. Please change your account to create a new wallet.
this_account_will_be_logged_out_after_th: Please note that you are deleting the last wallet and this account will be logged out after the wallet is successfully deleted!
Delegated_harvesting_text_1: Delegated harvesting enables an account to use a proxy private key that can be shared with a node securely. An eligible account may also delegate its importance score to a remote node for harvesting. In other words, you can use the importance score of your account to create new blocks without running a node.
Multisig_accounts_can_not_send_a_transac: Multisig accounts can not send a transaction by themselves.
refresh_too_fast_warning: The refresh rate is too high, please try again later.
Wallet_network_type_does_not_match_curre: Wallet network type does not match the current node network type.
no_network_currency_alert: The wallet has no data about the network currency (eg. nem:xem), please connect to a valid node.
Refresh_partial_transaction_of_address: Refresh partial transactions of a given address
divisibility_can_not_more_than_6: Divisibility can not be more than 6.
Your_remote_account_has_been_successfull: Your remote account has been successfully saved in the wallet!
Import_your_remote_account_in_the_wallet: Import your remote account in the wallet
account_must_match_linked: The account you are importing must match the linked account key below.
if_want_new_account_unlink: If you want to use a new remote account, please unlink your account from it.
Nothing_was_found_at_this_address: Nothing was found at this address
Only_one_type_of_wallet_can_be_created_i: Only one type of wallet can be created in one account. If you want to use a wallet with different network types, please create an account of another network type first.
mnemonic_description: The mnemonic is a 24-word seed file. By importing this seed file, you can restore your wallet. Please keep it safe and keep it confidential.
please_enter_a_custom_nod_address: Please enter a custom node URL
